definition: Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)/refers to the Western Han and Eastern Han
handed down from ancient times/family heirloom
the Song dynasty (960-1279)/refers to the Northern (960-1127) and Southern Song (1128-1279)
the Spring and Autumn (770-476 BC) and Warring States (475-221 BC) periods
bronze implement/refers to ancient bronze artifacts, from c. 2,000 BC
to read and interpret ancient texts/to decipher
